snippet.title: Mental Omega 3.0 - Official Trailer // C&C Red Alert 2
snippet.description:
1982. Hungering for revenge, the Soviets launch a full-scale invasion against the United States of America. The Allied primary defense network is shut down under mysterious circumstances and the only thing between the Soviets and America is a tiny little ocean. The third Great World War begins, where the strings are pulled by a single man - a remnant of Stalin's psychic legacy.

Mental Omega: Almost Perfect Yuri's Revenge is a free, fan-made expansion pack for Command & Conquer Red Alert 2 Yuri's Revenge. It started off as a balance modification created by Speeder and Mevitar and was first released in 2005. After a few years, it had grown into an unofficial sequel with new campaigns for the Allies, Soviets, and Yuri. Now, the Mentalmeisters hope to revive interest in this classic game with version 3.0 of the mod.

Enhanced with the powerful Ares Expansion DLL, Mental Omega 3.0 strives to bring new features to C&C Red Alert 2 Yuri's Revenge while maintaining a strong sense of gameplay balance. New units, subfactions, campaigns, co-op missions, skirmish maps & game modes - all included in the first public beta.

Mental Omega 3.0 will continue where the first Red Alert left off and branch out into an expanded universe with brand new singleplayer and cooperative missions for all three factions.

Mental Omega 3.0 Public Beta is available now: http://mentalomega.com/download

* * *

● Website - http://mentalomega.com
● Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/MentalOmegaAPYR
● Twitter - http://twitter.com/speeder_mo
● ModDB - http://www.moddb.com/mods/mental-omega
● Twitch.tv - http://www.twitch.tv/mentalmeisters
● IRC Chat - http://mentalomega.com/chat

Music: Helix6 - No. 6 // Black Ice 9 - Mor'Shadan & Outbreak

Alt. version: http://www.moddb.com/mods/mental-omega/videos/mental-omega-30-public-beta-trailer
